conclusion: Determine if the direction of Car A's acceleration changes within the time interval of 0 to 4 seconds.
The v-t graph for Car A consists of two identical arcs.
The slope of Car A’s v-t curve stays positive during the whole 0 s – 4 s interval.
Since the slope of Car A's v-t curve stays positive, its acceleration always points in the same direction.
Car A's acceleration never reverses direction.
